translation:
Today at 5 o'clock in the morning our enemies coming from Cima da Serra entered the chapel of Santa Maria, and wanting to discover their strength I sent Lieutenant José Jacinto with 5 men, and in the first shots he was killed, and after observing the strength I retired with 10 men, which was the force I had; on the same date I have already notified the Illustrious Mr. João Antônio, reporting the occurrence; the strength I was able to observe was about one hundred and some men; I remain at this point keeping watch over the enemy's march.

Alexandre Manuel Pereira — Captain of National Guards Vacacaí, December 15, 1839, at 8 o'clock in the morning.

It is correct. The captain employed at the War Secretariat. (a) Vicente Ferrer de Almeida.

Annexed to document CV-123.
